hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path of #hearts#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #0# major items.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that you must read the names of "Special Deal" items in shops carefully.

HC (Malon).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Near Four Armos Chest

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Compass#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say it's 106 miles to Hyrule Castle, we have half a bar of magic, it's dark, and we're wearing sunglasses.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #Gerudo's Fortress# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: Oh!^Oh-oh!^C'mon!^Come on! Come on! Come on!^HOT!!^What a hot beat!^WHOOOOAH!^YEEEEAH!^YAHOOO!!

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Wallet#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that ##the Deku Tree## has #2# major items.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #cow behind webs# in a grotto gifts #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #northern basement of the Water Temple# contains...^ #a Boss Key# and #Deku Stick Capacity#.
hinted_locations: Water Temple GS Near Boss Key Chest

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Bow#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Falling Spikes Room

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Kakariko Bazaar#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path of time.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #stable#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Red Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Left Chest

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that a hero ventures #beyond the wasteland# to learn #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Piece of Heart#.
